title: Shura

properties.name: description
properties.value: Shura is a siren who acts as an Item Retrieval Service for players to reclaim their lost items after a death when fighting The Nightmare. Retrieving items costs 60,000 coins. Note that if the player dies a second time anywhere without reclaiming the items Shura is holding, they will be permanently lost, unless the death occurs within a safe minigame, such as the TzHaar Fight Cave.

NPC ID9413,9414

Shura is a siren who acts as an Item Retrieval Service for players to reclaim their lost items after a death when fighting The Nightmare. Retrieving items costs 60,000 coins. Note that if the player dies a second time anywhere without reclaiming the items Shura is holding, they will be permanently lost, unless the death occurs within a safe minigame, such as the TzHaar Fight Cave.

Shura is a siren from Ashihama, an island in The Pincers region of the Eastern Lands. Found in the Sisterhood Sanctuary under Slepe, she was pursuing The Nightmare after successfully driving her away from Ashihama.

[[File:Shura chathead.png|left]]
'''Shura''' is a [[siren]] who acts as an [[Item Retrieval Service]] for players to reclaim their lost items after a [[Mo Kal|death]] when fighting [[The Nightmare]]. Retrieving items costs 60,000 [[coins]]. Note that if the player dies a second time '''anywhere''' without reclaiming the items Shura is holding, they will be '''permanently''' lost, unless the death occurs within a safe [[minigame]], such as the [[TzHaar Fight Cave]].

Shura is a [[siren]] from {{RSL|Ashihama}}, an island in {{RSL|The Pincers}} region of the [[Eastern Lands]]. Found in the [[Sisterhood Sanctuary]] under [[Slepe]], she was pursuing [[The Nightmare]] after successfully driving her away from Ashihama.
